name: Trick or TYeet
description:
NOTICE

Please download this updated version instead. While the game did work fine while testing, when built, UPR + XR caused a bug that made weapon holsters broken, making the game unplayable. The bug was fixed in 5 minutes.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1fgZgzhOby-HO3cIoZ9vhQVslC1xREeJh/view?usp=shari...

It's 2020, no contact with other people, but you still want some candy. That's okay!

Use the hook on your left to catch drones (and ghost drones!). Aim and shoot with trigger, grab the handle with the other hand and reel it in!

Use the vacuum on the right to suck up the candy (white cubes, didn't make it in time haha) and to kill the ghosts!
